history.proof: intros Phi x y H1 H2. srun best use: @deduction_subst, @DeductionSubst_2_DeductionSubst1 unfold: DeductionSubst1, DeductionSubst.

ctx: intros Phi x y H1 H2.
tactic: apply DeductionWeaken with (Phi := Phi) (x := z); auto.
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable Phi (possible name is: L).

ctx: intros Phi x y H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros Phi x y H1 H2.
